options.text: Monthly creative blockages in Asana due to unclear briefs, delaying 30% of tasks.
options.why: Leads to inefficiencies and missed deadlines.

options.text: Weekly miscommunications in Slack causing 25% project delays for 10-50p teams.
options.why: Directly impacts project timelines and team efficiency.
assumptions: Teams rely on Slack for communication

options.text: Bi-weekly delays in Asana tasks due to timezone gaps, affecting 40% of projects.
options.why: Delays disrupt timelines, lowering client satisfaction.
